mapper.select:
SELECT T1.SL_RCOG_DT AS SL_RCOG_DT --매출인식일자 ,F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SELL_TP_CD', T1.SELL_TP_CD) AS SELL_TP_CD --판매유형 ,F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SELL_TP_DTL_CD', T1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD) AS SELL_TP_DTL_CD --판매유형상세코드
,'' AS PD_CD ,'' AS PD_NM
,T1.PD_CD --상품코드 ,T2.PD_NM --상품명
,T1.SAP_PD_DV_CD ,(SELECT SAP_PD_DV_NM AS CODE_NAME /*SAP상품항목코드*/ FROM TB_CBCL_SAP_PD_DV_CD WHERE SAP_BZ_TERY_CD = '1210' /*에듀는 1110, 웰스는 1210*/ AND SAP_PD_ATC_CD = '00' /*상품항목 00 - SAP상품코드인건, 01부터는 SAP항목코드*/ AND SAP_PD_DV_CD = T1.SAP_PD_DV_CD GROUP BY SAP_PD_DV_CD, SAP_PD_DV_NM) AS SAP_PD_DV_NM --SAP구분코드명 ,SUM(DECODE(T1.RENTAL_TN,0,DECODE(NVL(T1.CNTR_AMT,0),0,0,1),0)) AS RENTAL_RGST_COST_CNT --계정수량-등록비 ,SUM(DECODE(T1.RENTAL_TN,0,NVL(T1.CNTR_AMT,0),0)) AS RENTAL_RGST_COST --매출금액-등록비 ,SUM(DECODE(T1.RENTAL_TN,0,NVL(T1.CNTR_AMT,0) - NVL(T1.RENTAL_RGST_COST_VAT,0),0)) AS RENTAL_RGST_COST_SPL --공급가액-등록비 ,SUM(DECODE(T1.RENTAL_TN,0,NVL(T1.RENTAL_RGST_COST_VAT,0),0)) AS RENTAL_RGST_COST_VAT --부가세-등록비 ,SUM(NVL(T1.SL_QTY,0)) AS SL_QTY --계정수량-렌탈료 ,SUM(NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0)) AS NOM_SL_AMT --매출금액-렌탈료 ,SUM(NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0)) - SUM(NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0)) AS SPL_AMT --공급가액-렌탈료 ,SUM(NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0)) AS VAT --부가세-렌탈료 ,SUM(DECODE(T1.RENTAL_TN,0,DECODE(NVL(T1.CNTR_AMT,0),0,0,1),0)) + SUM(NVL(T1.SL_QTY,0)) AS TOT_QTY --계정수량-매출합계 ,SUM(DECODE(T1.RENTAL_TN,0,NVL(T1.CNTR_AMT,0),0)) + SUM(NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0)) AS TOT_SL_AMT --매출금액-매출합계 ,(SUM(DECODE(T1.RENTAL_TN,0,NVL(T1.CNTR_AMT,0) - NVL(T1.RENTAL_RGST_COST_VAT,0),0))) + (SUM(NVL(T1.THM_SL_SUM_AMT,0)) - SUM(NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0))) AS TOT_SPL --공급가액-매출합계 ,SUM(DECODE(T1.RENTAL_TN,0,NVL(T1.RENTAL_RGST_COST_VAT,0),0)) + SUM(NVL(T1.SL_SUM_VAT,0)) AS TOT_VAT --부가세-매출합계 FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ T1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T2 ON T1.PD_CD = T2.PD_CD /*원두제외*/ LEFT JOIN (SELECT /*+ USE_NL(SA B C) */ SA.CNTR_NO, SA.CNTR_SN, B.PD_CD, B.PD_NM, C.REF_PD_CLSF_VAL FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_PD_REL SA /*계약상품관계*/ , TB_PDBS_PD_BAS B /*상품기본*/ , TB_PDBS_PD_CLSF_BAS C /*상품분류기본*/ WHERE SA.BASE_PD_CD = B.PD_CD AND B.PD_CLSF_ID = C.PD_CLSF_ID AND C.REF_PD_CLSF_VAL IN ('05003002','0A003002') /*참조상품분류값 = 상품대분류2자리||상품중분류3자리||상품소분류3자리||상품세분류3자리*/ ) T7 ON T7.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T7.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN WHERE T1.SL_RCOG_DT BETWEEN #{baseDtFrom} AND #{baseDtTo} AND T1.SELL_TP_CD = #{sellTpCd}
AND T1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD = #{sellTpDtlCd}
AND SUBSTR(SL_RCOG_DT,1,6) = T1.SL_CL_YM
AND T1.SELL_INFLW_CHNL_DTL_CD = #{sellChnlDvCd} /*판매채널*/
AND T1.SAP_PD_DV_CD = #{sapPdDvCd} --SAP상품구분코드
AND T7.CNTR_NO IS NULL AND T7.CNTR_SN IS NULL GROUP BY T1.SL_RCOG_DT, T1.SELL_TP_CD, T1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD,
T1.PD_CD, T2.PD_NM,
T1.SAP_PD_DV_CD
